parameters.jsCode: return [{ json: { success: true, message: 'æ¤œç´¢çµæœãªã—', items: [], scores: [] } }];

parameters.query: INSERT INTO research_results (user_id, keyword, item_id, title, sold_price_usd, sold_count, image_url, seller_id, profit_score, risk_score, trend_score, total_score, verdict, reasoning, estimated_profit_margin, risk_factors, recommended_price_jpy, auto_forwarded, created_at) SELECT $1, $2, (item->>'item_id')::text, (item->>'title')::text, (item->>'sold_price_usd')::numeric, (item->>'sold_count')::int, (item->>'image_url')::text, (item->>'seller_id')::text, (item->'scores'->>'profit')::int, (item->'scores'->>'risk')::int, (item->'scores'->>'trend')::int, (item->'scores'->>'total')::int, (item->>'verdict')::text, (item->>'reasoning')::text, (item->>'estimated_profit_margin')::numeric, (item->>'risk_factors')::jsonb, (item->>'recommended_price_jpy')::int, true, NOW() FROM jsonb_array_elements($3::jsonb) AS item ON CONFLICT (user_id, item_id) DO UPDATE SET total_score = EXCLUDED.total_score, verdict = EXCLUDED.verdict, updated_at = NOW()

parameters.name: x-n3-signature
parameters.value: ={{ require('crypto').createHmac('sha256', $env.N8N_HMAC_SECRET).update(Date.now() + '.' + JSON.stringify({ items: $json.high_score_items.slice(0, 5).map(i => ({ title: i.title, price_usd: i.sold_price_usd })) })).digest('hex') }}

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ action: 'find_suppliers', user_id: $json.config.user_id, items: $json.high_score_items.slice(0, 5).map(i => ({ title: i.title, price_usd: i.sold_price_usd, item_id: i.item_id })), triggered_by: 'mekiki_agent' }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ action: 'queue_from_research', user_id: $json.config.user_id, items: $json.high_score_items.slice(0, 10).map(i => ({ title: i.title, price_usd: i.sold_price_usd, item_id: i.item_id, recommended_price_jpy: i.recommended_price_jpy, verdict: i.verdict })), triggered_by: 'mekiki_agent' }) }}
